metadata.title: CVE-2019-10023 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an FPE in the function PostScriptFunction::exec at Function.cc for the psOpMod case.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 pfsmorigo> since there is not public repository, just a tarball, I analised the file in question (Function.cc) with the affected version and they seems the same mdeslaur> same commit as CVE-2019-10018

criterions.comment: poppler package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu3').
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
